kDesc

Super Powered Peep is fueled by Heavy Water for all of his mad skills! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Super Powered Peep - Bolting Blue
 ・Super Powered Peep - Static Mini - Bolting Blue
 ・Super Powered Peep - Heavy Pet - Bolting Blue


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Super Powered Peep est alimente par Heavy Water pour tous ses talents de fou! C'est trois en un avec Peep Fun supplementaire! Ramène ton Peep à ton appartement et que le fête commence. Tu peux contrôler ton Peep avec des animations et manœuvres spécialisées. Prends le à l'extérieur de ton appartement comme compagnon ou expose le chez toi dans sa boîte Peep-a-Boo. Ramasse les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir![#Legal]

Angetrieben von Heavy Water ist Super Powered Peep bereit für alle seine verrückten Fähigkeiten! Er kommt im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß zu dir! Bring dein Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm ihn als Gefährten mit nach draußen oder stelle ihn in deiner Wohnung in seiner Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus! [#Legal]

Super Powered Peep é alimentato da Heavy Water dovuto alle sue straordinarie abilitá! Divertimento extra Peep al tre per uno! Porta il tuo Peep nel tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio. Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portalo fuori dal tuo appartamento come Companion oppure mettilo in mostra nel tuo appartamento nella sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Colleziona tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

Super Powered Peep es impulsado por Heavy Water debido a sus tremendas habilidades! Más diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva a tu Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_19 [#Legal]

Super Powered Peep을 Heavy Water로 충전하여 환상의 스킬을 경험해 보세요! 추가 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Super Powered Peep - 전격 블루
 ●Super Powered Peep - Static Mini - 전격 블루
 ●Super Powered Peep - Heavy Pet - 전격 블루


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

Super Powered Peep is fueled by Heavy Water for all of his mad skills! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!

Super Powered Peep由Heavy Water提供動力，使出瘋狂的技巧！給您特別的Peep樂趣！帶Peep進入您家，開始玩樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。他可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將他放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子，成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！本組合包含以下商品：


●Super Powered Peep - 極速藍
 ●Super Powered Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 極速藍
 ●Super Powered Peep - Heavy Pet - 極速藍


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
